pipeline.grass.name: Grass
config.grass.shadow.enabled.desc: Enable hard shadows from the sky
config.grass.shadow.resolution.desc: The resolution of the shadow map
config.grass.shadow.sunlight_angle.desc: The angle that the sunlight hits blocks
config.grass.shading_type.desc: The type of shading to use
config.grass.posterization.levels.desc: The number of levels to posterize to
config.grass.cel_shading.steps.desc: The number of brightness levels to use for cel shading
config.grass.cel_shading.smooth.desc: Smooth the cel shading effect before filtering
config.grass.sky.enabled.desc: Replace the vanilla sky with a custom sky
config.grass.aa.desc: The type of anti-aliasing to use
